item.title: What
item.description: Træfɪk is a modern HTTP reverse proxy and load balancer made to deploy microservices with ease. It supports several backends (Docker, Swarm, Mesos/Marathon, Kubernetes, Consul, Etcd, Zookeeper, BoltDB, Rest API, file…) to manage its configuration automatically and dynamically.

item.title: Features
item.description:
• It’s fast
  • No dependency hell, single binary made with go
  • Rest API
  • Multiple backends supported: Docker, Mesos/Marathon, Consul, Etcd, and more to come
  • Watchers for backends, can listen change in backends to apply a new configuration automatically
  • Hot-reloading of configuration. No need to restart the process
  • Graceful shutdown http connections
  • Circuit breakers on backends
  • Round Robin, rebalancer load-balancers
  • Rest Metrics
  • Tiny official docker image included
  • SSL backends support
  • SSL frontend support (with SNI)
  • Clean AngularJS Web UI
  • Websocket support
  • HTTP/2 support
  • Retry request if network error
  • Let’s Encrypt support (Automatic HTTPS)

item.title: Clean UI
item.description: Træfɪk has a simple Web UI based on AngularJS.

item.title: Demo
item.description: Here is a demo of Træfɪk using Docker backend, showing a load-balancing between two servers, hot reloading of configuration, and graceful shutdown.

item.title: Get it
item.description:
• The simple way: grab the latest binary from the releases page and just run it with the sample configuration file:
./traefik -c traefik.toml
  • Use the tiny Docker image:
docker run -d -p 8080:8080 -p 80:80 -v $PWD/traefik.toml:/etc/traefik/traefik.toml traefik
  • From sources:
git clone https://github.com/containous/traefik

You can find the complete documentation here.

item.title: Partners
item.description:
Zenika is one of the leading providers of professional Open Source services and agile methodologies in Europe. We provide consulting, development, training and support for the world’s leading Open Source software products.

Founded in 2014, Asteris creates next-generation infrastructure software for the modern datacenter. Asteris writes software that makes it easy for companies to implement continuous delivery and realtime data pipelines. We support the HashiCorp stack, along with Kubernetes, Apache Mesos, Spark and Kafka. We’re core committers on mantl.io, consul-cli and mesos-consul.

item.title: Support
item.description: You can join to get basic support. If you prefer a commercial support, please contact containo.us by mail: support@containo.us.
